attributes.action: To make it law to cover news papers in retail outlets
attributes.background:
To cover news papers in retail outlets to protect our health. Like tobacco has in recent years. 
News papers are owned and edited under bias opinion. Their very opinion is detrimental to mental health on a very wide scale.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
